name: The God of High School
description:
Official Facebook Shortcuts
www.facebook.com/pangglogoh

The first place Korean action webtoon's master piece 『God of Highschool』!!
Free to play mobile game 'God of Highschool' with 100% equal to the Kwebtoon
Let's become the god of highschool with combat and strategy!

Spectacular Battle
Implemented the webtoon's original action skill realistically!!
Enjoy the dynamic battle with up, down, left, right control and repeated touch!
Nonstop high-level special arts during auto battle!

The story Immersed in an instant
The challenge for Jin-Mori, the boy who wants to surpass his grandfather, and his friends' God begins.
Become the best in the God of Highschool stage to wish everyone's wish!

It's good to be alone, but it's better to be together, Team Combination
Gather your colleagues and organize a party. You can't aim for the peak of God of High School alone.
Gathering and reinforcing your own party and challenge God of High School.

Variety of things to enjoy
There's a lot of fun with various contents!!
[5 PVP Ranking Modes] [30vs30 School Competition] [Guild Competition] [Boss Raid] and etc..

Customer Service Center
panggamehelp@panggame.com
